name: Corpse Feeder
description:
Controls
DPad/Left Stick - Move
East Button - Dash
South Button - Shoot
Select - Target Closest Enemy

Description
A simple action game, inspired by twin-stick shooters, but with a targeting system to make it playable with Game Boy controls.

Originally I had plans to place the corpses in a coffin to create friendly NPCs to follow you around, but due to working and other events during GBJAM 10, I had to wrap things up last minute so the exhumed (unplanted) corpses simply level you up.
Also, only the one area to the east is available, and one cannot actually enter the cave.

The environment tileset is from Kenney, mostly unedited. Most other sprites are from Kenney but edited by me in Aseprite. SFX are various free use sound effects from OpenGameArt and itch.
